attributes.review: When I first got the app it said I couldn’t get it because I was a minority, then it proceeds to dance to my niki Minaj song in the back, I couldn’t stop it 😪 until my 5 year son saw what was happening and proceed to throw it back distracting it  I smashed it 😩😩😩NEVER AGAIN.
